subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It’s a rare player who pays such close attention while being stuck on the bench. But Mike Baxter does. This season, he is 5 for 9 as a pinch-hitter.
snippet: It’s a rare player who pays such close attention while being stuck on the bench. But Mike Baxter does. This season, he is 5 for 9 as a pinch-hitter.
